body:
- The TaskCluster build failure seemed intermittent, so I needed to bump the build.
- This PR had merge conflicts, so I rebased and fixed them.
- Rebasing on the latest preference-experiments branch ended up mixing async-style and generator-style tests in the PreferenceExperiments.jsm tests, so I did the conversion over to async. This should've been done here anyway, because @mythmon found out that the mixup between async and generator tests was causing test failures to be ignored.

The end result is that:

1. There's a new commit with the async test refactor and one new test.
2. #681 is probably going to conflict after this merges since I did the async refactor in this PR.

Thank you for your patience!
